member.name: T:EO.WebEngine.BrowserOptions
member.summary: Contains options for a WebView instance.

member.name: M:EO.WebEngine.BrowserOptions.Clone
member.summary: To create a copy of this class.

member.name: P:EO.WebEngine.BrowserOptions.DefaultEncoding
member.summary: Gets or sets the default page encoding.
member.remarks: If you do not set this property, ISO-8859-1 encoding is used.

member.name: P:EO.WebEngine.BrowserOptions.UserStyleSheet
member.summary: Gets or sets the additional style sheets to be applied to the document.

member.name: P:EO.WebEngine.BrowserOptions.AllowJavaScript
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether JavaScript should be allowed.
member.remarks: If you do not set this property, default value true is used.

member.name: P:EO.WebEngine.BrowserOptions.AllowJavaScriptOpenWindow
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether opening a new window from JavaScript should be allowed.
member.remarks: If you do not set this property, the default value true is used.

member.name: P:EO.WebEngine.BrowserOptions.AllowJavaScriptCloseWindow
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether using JavaScript to close a window that was not opened with JavaScript should be allowed.

remarks.para: This property controls whether using JavaScript to close a window that was not opened with JavaScript should be allowed. Windows that were opened with JavaScript are always be allowed.
If you do not set this property, the default value true is used.

member.name: P:EO.WebEngine.BrowserOptions.AllowJavaScriptAccessClipboard
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether accessing clipboard from JavaScript should be allowed.
member.remarks: If you do not set this property, the default value false is used.

member.name: P:EO.WebEngine.BrowserOptions.AllowPlugins
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether any plug-in can be loaded.
member.remarks: If you do not set this property, default value true is used.

member.name: P:EO.WebEngine.BrowserOptions.EnableWebSecurity
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to enforce same-origin policy.
member.remarks: If you do not set this property, default value true is used. When this option is enabled, the browser enforce same-origin policy. For example, it does not allow JavaScript code from one site to access contents of a page from another site. This is a major security measure thus all modern browsers enforce this policy by default.

member.name: P:EO.WebEngine.BrowserOptions.EnableXSSAuditor
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to enable XSS auditor.
member.remarks: If you do not set this property, default value true is used, which enables the XSS Auditor. The XSS auditor is a built-in security feature designed to mitigate reflective XSS (cross site scripting).

member.name: P:EO.WebEngine.BrowserOptions.LoadImages
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the browser engine should automatically load images.
member.remarks: If you do not set this property, default value true is used. In that case the browser engine will automatically loads images if necessary. When this property is set to false, the browser will only the image only if it is already in the cache.

member.name: P:EO.WebEngine.BrowserOptions.Cursor
member.summary: Gets or sets the default cursor.

member.name: P:EO.WebEngine.BrowserOptions.AllowZooming
member.summary: Gets or sets a value to determine whether user can use Ctrl + mouse wheel or +/- to zoom the current view.
member.remarks: If you do not set this value, default value true is used.

member.name: T:EO.WebEngine.CursorType
member.summary: Specifies the type of the cursor.

member.name: F:EO.WebEngine.CursorType.Auto
member.summary: The browser determines the cursor to display based on the current context.

member.name: F:EO.WebEngine.CursorType.Default
member.summary: Default cursor, typically an arrow.

member.name: F:EO.WebEngine.CursorType.None
member.summary: No cursor is rendered.

member.name: F:EO.WebEngine.CursorType.Help
member.summary: ndicating help is available.

member.name: F:EO.WebEngine.CursorType.Pointer
member.summary: E.g. used when hovering over links, typically a hand.

member.name: F:EO.WebEngine.CursorType.Progress
member.summary: The program is busy in the background but the user can still interact with the interface (unlike for wait).

member.name: F:EO.WebEngine.CursorType.Wait
member.summary: The program is busy (sometimes an hourglass or a watch).

member.name: F:EO.WebEngine.CursorType.CrossHair
member.summary: Cross cursor, often used to indicate selection in a bitmap.

member.name: F:EO.WebEngine.CursorType.Text
member.summary: Indicating text can be selected, typically an I-beam.

member.name: F:EO.WebEngine.CursorType.VerticalText
member.summary: Indicating that vertical text can be selected, typically a sideways I-beam.

member.name: F:EO.WebEngine.CursorType.Alias
member.summary: Indicating an alias or shortcut is to be created.

member.name: F:EO.WebEngine.CursorType.Copy
member.summary: Indicating that something can be copied.

member.name: F:EO.WebEngine.CursorType.Move
member.summary: The hovered object may be moved.

member.name: F:EO.WebEngine.CursorType.NotAllowed
member.summary: Cursor showing that something cannot be done.

member.name: F:EO.WebEngine.CursorType.ColResize
member.summary: The item/column can be resized horizontally. Often rendered as arrows pointing left and right with a vertical bar separating.

member.name: F:EO.WebEngine.CursorType.RowResize
member.summary: The item/row can be resized vertically. Often rendered as arrows pointing up and down with a horizontal bar separating them.

member.name: F:EO.WebEngine.CursorType.EWResize
member.summary: East-west resize.

member.name: F:EO.WebEngine.CursorType.NSResize
member.summary: North-south resize.

member.name: F:EO.WebEngine.CursorType.NESWResize
member.summary: North east to south west resize.

member.name: F:EO.WebEngine.CursorType.NWSEResize
member.summary: North west to south east resize.

member.name: F:EO.WebEngine.CursorType.ZoomIn
member.summary: Zoom in.

member.name: F:EO.WebEngine.CursorType.ZoomOut
member.summary: Zoom out.

member.name: F:EO.WebEngine.CursorType.Grab
member.summary: Indicates that something can be grabbed.

member.name: F:EO.WebEngine.CursorType.Custom
member.summary: Custom cursor.

member.name: T:EO.WebEngine.Cursor
member.summary: Represents a cursor.

member.summary: Initializes a of a predefined cursor type.

member.summary: Initalizes a custom cursor.
member.param: The Uri of the custom cursor, can be a local file name.

member.name: M:EO.WebEngine.Cursor.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Initalizes a custom cursor.
member.param: The Uri of the custom cursor, can be a local file name.

member.name: M:EO.WebEngine.Cursor.#ctor(System.String,System.Byte[],System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Initalizes a custom cursor.

member.summary: Initalizes a custom cursor.

member.name: P:EO.WebEngine.Cursor.Type
member.summary: Gets the cursor type.

member.name: P:EO.WebEngine.Cursor.HotSpot
member.summary: Gets the hotspot for the cursor.

member.name: T:EO.WebEngine.EngineState
member.summary: Represents the state of a browser engine.

member.name: F:EO.WebEngine.EngineState.Created
member.summary: The engine has been created by has not started yet.

member.name: F:EO.WebEngine.EngineState.Starting
member.summary: The engine is starting.

member.name: F:EO.WebEngine.EngineState.Running
member.summary: The engine is running.

member.name: F:EO.WebEngine.EngineState.Stopping
member.summary: The engine is stopping.

member.name: F:EO.WebEngine.EngineState.Stopped
member.summary: The engine is stopped.

member.name: T:EO.WebEngine.EngineEventArgs
member.summary: Provides additional information for an event.

member.name: P:EO.WebEngine.EngineEventArgs.Data
member.summary: Gets or sets the data to be associated to the engine.
member.remarks: You can change this property in your event handler. After the event handler, the value of this property is stored in Engine.Data property.

member.name: T:EO.WebEngine.EngineEventHandler
member.summary: Represents the method that will handle an event.

member.name: T:EO.WebEngine.Engine
member.summary: Represents a browser engine.

member.name: M:EO.WebEngine.Engine.Create(System.String)
member.summary: Creates a new browser engine instance.

member.name: M:EO.WebEngine.Engine.FromName(System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Gets a browser engine by the engine name.
member.param: True to automatically create the engine if an engine with the specific name does not exist.
member.returns: Returns the matching object if a match is found or autoCreate is true. Otherwise null.

member.name: M:EO.WebEngine.Engine.FromName(System.String)
member.summary: Gets the browser engine by engine name.
member.returns: Returns the matching object if a match is found, otherwise null.

member.name: M:EO.WebEngine.Engine.FromID(System.Int32)
member.summary: Gets the browser engine by engine ID.

member.name: M:EO.WebEngine.Engine.Start
member.summary: Starts the engine.

member.name: M:EO.WebEngine.Engine.Stop(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Stop the engine.
member.param: Whether to automatically delete cached data (including history, cache, cookies, etc) during the life span of the engine.

member.name: M:EO.WebEngine.Engine.GetChildProcessIDs
member.summary: Returns a list of child process IDs.

remarks.para: Chromium browser engine employs a multi-process architecture. Use this method to returns the PID of the child processes in which the browser engine runs. The first PID is the main browser process. The rest PIDs are child processes for other purposes --- such as rendering process, GPU processes, plug-in processes, etc.
If the function fails (for example, the engine is not running), the return value is null.

member.name: P:EO.WebEngine.Engine.Default
member.summary: Gets the default engine.

member.name: P:EO.WebEngine.Engine.AllowRestart
member.summary: Gets or sets a value specifying whether the engine can be restarted.

member.name: P:EO.WebEngine.Engine.ID
member.summary: Gets the unique engine ID.

member.name: P:EO.WebEngine.Engine.Name
member.summary: Gets the engine name.

member.name: P:EO.WebEngine.Engine.Options
member.summary: Gets the options for this engine.

member.name: P:EO.WebEngine.Engine.State
member.summary: Gets the engine state.

member.name: P:EO.WebEngine.Engine.Data
member.summary: Gets or sets custom engine data.

member.name: E:EO.WebEngine.Engine.Started
member.summary: Occurs when the engine has been started.

member.name: E:EO.WebEngine.Engine.Stopped
member.summary: Occurs when the engine has been stopped.

member.name: T:EO.WebEngine.EngineOptions
member.summary: Contains options for a browser engine.

member.name: M:EO.WebEngine.EngineOptions.#ctor
member.summary: Creates a new instance of the object.

member.name: M:EO.WebEngine.EngineOptions.RegisterCustomSchemes(System.String[])
member.summary: Registers one or more protocoal schemes.
member.param: One or more custom protocol schemes.
member.remarks: See custom resource handler for more information on how to use this method.

member.name: M:EO.WebEngine.EngineOptions.SetDefaultBrowserOptions(EO.WebEngine.BrowserOptions)
member.summary: Sets the default options for all WebView objects created after this call.
member.remarks: This function does not affect WebView objects created before this function is called.

member.name: M:EO.WebEngine.EngineOptions.AllowProprietaryMediaFormats
member.summary: Enable proprietary media formats support.
member.remarks: By default supports for certain media formats (particularly MP4 video and MP3 audio) are disabled because these formats are covered by patents. If you wish to use these formats, you must check whether you are in compliance with the license terms of the specific patent owners. See here for more details. Once you are in compliance, you can call this method to enable supports to those media formats.

member.name: M:EO.WebEngine.EngineOptions.Clone
member.summary: Make a copy of this class.

member.name: P:EO.WebEngine.EngineOptions.Default
member.summary: Gets the default engine options.

member.name: P:EO.WebEngine.EngineOptions.CachePath
member.summary: Gets or sets the cache path.
member.remarks: This path is also used to store cookies.

member.name: P:EO.WebEngine.EngineOptions.RemoteDebugPort
member.summary: Gets or sets the remote debug port.

member.name: P:EO.WebEngine.EngineOptions.DisableGPU
member.summary: Gets or sets whether to disable GPU.

member.name: P:EO.WebEngine.EngineOptions.AutoScanCommonPlugins
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to automatically scan commonly used plugins.

remarks.para: By default, the browser engine automatically scans and loads plugins from the following directories:

list.item: The same directory where EO.WebBrowser.dll is located;
If FireFox is installed, then scans FireFox's plugin directory;
Acrobat or Acrobat reader browser plugin directory;

remarks.para: Set this property to false to skip scaning these directories.

member.name: P:EO.WebEngine.EngineOptions.AdditionalPluginsDirs
member.summary: Gets or sets additional plugin directories.

member.name: P:EO.WebEngine.EngineOptions.DisableBuiltInPlugIns
member.summary: Gets or sets a value to disable the built-in PDF plugin.
member.remarks: By default, EO.WebBrowser will automatically load the built-in plug-ins (such as the built-in PDF plug-in). Set this property to true if this is not desired.

member.name: P:EO.WebEngine.EngineOptions.Proxy
member.summary: Gets or sets the proxy information to be used by all WebViews.

member.name: P:EO.WebEngine.EngineOptions.UILanguage
member.summary: Gets or sets the UI language to be used in the format languagecode2-country/regioncode2.
member.remarks: See localization for more details about how to use this property.

member.name: P:EO.WebEngine.EngineOptions.GoogleAPIKey
member.summary: Gets or sets Google API key.

member.name: P:EO.WebEngine.EngineOptions.GoogleClientID
member.summary: Gets or sets Google client ID.

member.name: P:EO.WebEngine.EngineOptions.GoogleClientSecret
member.summary: Gets or sets Google client secret.

member.name: P:EO.WebEngine.EngineOptions.ExtraCommandLineArgs
member.summary: Gets or sets the additional command line arguments to be passed to the Chrome browser engine.

remarks.para: Google Chrome browser supports many command line switches, some of them are interpreted by the core browser engine. You can pass those command line arguments to the core browser engine through this property. For example, you can use "--disable-databases" to disable HTML 5 DB support.
Use space to separate multiple arguments. For example, use "--disable-databases --disable-local-storage " to disable both HTML 5 DB support and local storage support.

Note that not all switches supported by Google Chrome browser are interpreted by the core browser engine. For example, switch "--enable-cloud-devices" enable cloud device for Google Chrome browser, however cloud device support is a part of Google Chrome browser, but not a part of the core browser engine. As such this switch has no effect on EO.WebBrowser.

member.name: P:EO.WebEngine.EngineOptions.DisableSpellChecker
member.summary: Gets or sets a value to whether disable the built-in spell checker.
